pullrequest.title: Inline namespace with project major version

content.raw:
this repo has a yaml configuration file:

~~~
diff -r 37186bb05181 appveyor.yml
--- a/appveyor.yml	Thu Aug 17 16:25:04 2017 -0700
+++ b/appveyor.yml	Tue Aug 22 16:25:07 2017 -0700
@@ -1,5 +1,4 @@
 os:
-  - Visual Studio 2013
   - Visual Studio 2015
 
 configuration:
~~~

we'll also have to upgrade our windows jenkins node to VS2015
